books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel set in the Jazz Age that tells the story of Jay Gatsby's love for Daisy Buchanan.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality narrated by young Scout Finch.
